name: bcl2fastq
title: Convert bcl to fastq files
summary: Converts Illumina data from BCL to FASTQ, demultiplexing barcoded samples if appropriate

inputSpec.name: record_dxid
inputSpec.label: DNAnexus ID of the sequencing lane DXRecord.
inputSpec.help: The DNAnexus ID of the sequencing lane DXRecord.

inputSpec.name: test_mode
inputSpec.help: Demultiplexes a single tile to speed things up in test mode.

inputSpec.name: ignore_missing_positions
inputSpec.label: Ignore missing positions
inputSpec.help: (bcl2fastq2) Missing or corrupt positions files are ignored

inputSpec.name: ignore_missing_filter
inputSpec.label: Ignore missing filter files
inputSpec.help: (bcl2fastq2) Missing or corrupt filter files are ignored. Assumes Passing Filter for all clusters in tiles where filter files are missing.

inputSpec.name: tiles
inputSpec.label: Tiles to restrict the analysis to.
inputSpec.help: See --tiles argument of the Illumina tool bcl2fastq. Takes a comma-separated list of regular expressions to select only a subset of the tiles available in the flow-cell.
